```{r, fig.asp = 3/4, fig.align = 'center', echo = FALSE, out.width = "96%", dpi= 300, warning = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars) +
  aes(mpg, hp,
      color = cyl) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "mpg vs hp")
```
